meanings.sent1: My filos always supports me when I feel down.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy spending time with my filos during the weekends.
meanings.sent3: My filos and I have so much fun together, laughing and sharing stories.
meanings.sent4: She is like a ray of sunshine, my filos brightening up my days.
meanings.sent5: Having a loyal filos makes life more joyful and meaningful.

meanings.definition: A thin thread or strand, especially of silk.
meanings.sent1: The delicate filos of silk shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She carefully sewed the dress using a fine filos of thread.
meanings.sent3: The spider spun a web using its silky filos to catch insects.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight reflected off the silvery filos, creating a magical glow.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design was made using a single filos of golden thread.

meanings.definition: A type of Greek pastry filled with nuts and honey.
meanings.sent1: I love the sweet taste of filos with a cup of coffee.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells delicious filos that are perfect for dessert.
meanings.sent3: As a treat, I indulged in a flaky filos topped with honey.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked filos filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy filos paired perfectly with the rich nut filling.
